VTKAnimate Functions

Function to perform animation.

vtk_test1.load_mesh(fp)

Function to load VTK file from a local directory into a mesh pyvista object (pyvista.core.grid.ImageData). :param fp: A string with the path and name of the VTK file. :type fp: str

Notes: The path can be written in absolute or relative path.

vtk_test1.main()

Main function to execute the script functionality.

vtk_test1.print_mesh_info(m)

Function to print details of a mesh pyvista object (pyvista.core.grid.ImageData) such as dimensions, number of data points, name of parameters, number of parameters, etc. :param m: The array of data containing all the data and info about the simulation :type m: pyvista.core.grid.ImageData :param (output from ‘load_mesh’ function):

vtk_test1.slicer(m, dims, parameters, slices, dimensions)

Function to plot slices of the parameters data given along any of the 3 axis at any length. Currently only supporting 3D arrays from vtk files. :param m: The pyvista object containing all the data and info about the simulation :type m: pyvista.core.grid.ImageData :param (output from ‘load_mesh’ function): :param dims: Number of cells in each direction (output from get_dims function) :type dims: tuple of int :param parameters: Name of data parameters to plot a slice of :type parameters: tuple of str :param slices: Lengths at which a slice plot will be made given in cell numbers NOT physical length :type slices: tuple of int :param dimensions: Dimensions along a slice will be made. Valid options are: ‘x’, ‘y’, ‘z’ :type dimensions: tuple of str

Notes: The length of parameters, slices and dimensions tuples has to be the same.
